channel.title: Donna Haraway on
channel.description: Recent content in Donna Haraway on

item.title: Staying with the Trouble
item.description: Drawing from the Greek roots khthon (earth) and kainos ([[notes/concepts of time|time]]), Haraway coins Chthulucene as an alternative to the monikers [[notes/anthropocene]] or Capitalocene as labels for these turbulent times.
